name: ToyDoctor
0:
”Alexa, open Toy Doctor”
”Alexa, start Toy Doctor”
”Alexa, launch Toy Doctor”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: toy doctor
des:
While her Abuelita is at work as a doctor at the hospital, Olivia and her dog, Bruno, take care of the home, treating patients like Fuzzy the Teddy Bear, Rubber Ducky, and Frisky, Olivia’s pet hamster. From anxiety to coughing and tummy aches, this adventure is full of songs that teach you how to be a good doctor and help your friends feel better.

- Wash Your Hands
- Cover Your Face
- You Got a Boo Boo
- 4-7-8 Breathing
- Sometimes My Tummy Feels Funny

Help a vibrant cast of characters feel better in this fully-voiced musical adventure – but make sure you wash your hands first!

This skill is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
